# Plan

A theoretical underpinning of how trait evolve

* Neutral trait evolution _vs_ selective trait evolution

Neutral trait evolution proceeds randomly, in any direction, from parent to
offspring.

* Selective trait evolution:

Selective trait evolution happens at a given time when it does

- stabilizing selection
- directional selection
